text: midneunjadeul-iyeo sillo bulsinjadeul-eun bulgyeolhanani geudeullo hayeogeum geu hae ihu halamsawon-e jeobgeunhaji anh doleug hala neohuiga geolaeui sonsillo ganan-eul dulyeowo handamyeon hananim-eun geubun-ui eunhyelo neohuiege yangsig-eul jusilila sillo hananim-eun almgwa ji hyelo chungmanhasinila
